posts.post_content: A reprinted flip card? Never thought I'd see the day. Still, this one is GREAT. Instant-speed, targeted, cheap graveyard hate for one mode, instant-speed, repeatable, reasonable reanimation FROM ANY GRAVEYARD for the other. Nighteyes, I've missed you.

Posted By: DarthParallax (2/15/2012 5:18:51 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: An opponent use this in commander the other day and there was some confusion. Can Nezumi flip by targeting a graveyard that is already empty? I've never thought so, but I can't find any rulings.
posts.html:
An opponent use this in commander the other day and there was some confusion. Can Nezumi flip by targeting a graveyard that is already empty? I've never thought so, but I can't find any rulings.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: WalkerCyrmych (5/29/2012 3:56:54 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@Walker  
No; to "remove target card" you need to be able to target a card. If this was:  
"Remove a card from target player's graveyard"  
  
then unless it had another clause about "if you do" you'd be fine to do it if it's already empty. As it is, you need to target a card, successfully remove it, and that be the last card in the graveyard.
posts.html:
@Walker
No; to "remove target card" you need to be able to target a card. If this was:
"Remove a card from target player's graveyard"

then unless it had another clause about "if you do" you'd be fine to do it if it's already empty. As it is, you need to target a card, successfully remove it, and that be the last card in the graveyard.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: blurrymadness (6/11/2012 9:37:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Bojuka Bog and Tormod's Crypt don't work. As BlurryMadness points out, you can't use the ability if there aren't any cards in the graveyard you're going after. Even if you activate it, then get rid of the graveyard, the ability is cancelled due to no legal targets.  
  
You cannot, without broken fast mana, flip this earlier than turn 3, no matter how many crypts or bojuka bogs you play.
posts.html:
Bojuka Bog and Tormod's Crypt don't work. As BlurryMadness points out, you can't use the ability if there aren't any cards in the graveyard you're going after. Even if you activate it, then get rid of the graveyard, the ability is cancelled due to no legal targets.

You cannot, without broken fast mana, flip this earlier than turn 3, no matter how many crypts or bojuka bogs you play.

posts.post_content: If you use a [Tormod's Crypt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tormod's Crypt) or something like that, they would be too overwhelmed to play an instant or sorcery or get anything killed... If you did kill their whole graveyard, you could still only have to use the ability once to flip him after they play the spell.

If you use a Tormod's Crypt or something like that, they would be too overwhelmed to play an instant or sorcery or get anything killed... If you did kill their whole graveyard, you could still only have to use the ability once to flip him after they play the spell.
